org.spongycastle.crypto.BufferedBlockCipher

  • Packages that use BufferedBlockCipher 
    Package Description
    org.spongycastle.crypto.engines
    Basic cipher classes.
    org.spongycastle.crypto.io
    Classes for doing "enhanced" I/O with Digests and MACs.
    org.spongycastle.crypto.modes
    Modes for symmetric ciphers.
    org.spongycastle.crypto.paddings
    Paddings for symmetric ciphers.

      Subclasses of BufferedBlockCipher in org.spongycastle.crypto.paddings 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PaddedBufferedBlockCipher
      A wrapper class that allows block ciphers to be used to process data in a piecemeal fashion with padding.
